description:
An automatic station deep in the space has sent an alarm signal and then the connection disrupted. Your spaceship set off there to carry out reconnaissance. But all of a sudden you encounter huge forces of an unknown enemy. Now there’s no way back – you either defeat them or die.

This game is a vertical scroll-shooter with numerous enemies and a gradually increasing level of complexity.
Game's features:
- 24 original levels
- 12 bosses
- An endless level mode with strong enemies
- Stylish 8-bit music
name: Deep Space Shooter
intro: Again you are alone against the hordes of hostile spacecrafts where you can only rely on yourself. It is the victory or the death!
